heading: HR01202
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT AND HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE JUNE 2, 2017 - VIOLENT DISPERSAL OF THE STRIKING WORKERS OF THE KOREAN-OWNED BANANA PLANTATION SHIN SUN TROPICAL FRUIT CORP. AND DEMOLITION OF THEIR PICKETLINE, LEADING TO THE ILLEGAL ARREST AND DETENTION OF TWELVE WORKERS AND THEIR SUPPORTERS IN BRGY. SAN MIGUEL, COMPOSTELA TOWN, COMPOSTELA VALLEY

status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2017-08-30
